short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly see all linked GitHub repositories of any web page and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By using Repo Collector, you can instantly see which web pages have GitHub repositories:

8️⃣ GitHub links are indicated by a badge on the extension
❤️ Check out the repositories' statistics: Find out if they're maintained and how popular they are
⚡ Jump right into the code of any linked GitHub repository, no need to scan the whole webpage

Further, you will see any deep links to GitHub files or GitHub user profiles.

Repo Collector works almost entirely client-side, making only requests directly to GitHub for additional information.

GitHub Repository:
https://github.com/cyc8/repo-collector
